changes: Added import statement: from app.models.equipment_template import EquipmentTemplate
file_insights.purpose: Expose EquipmentTemplate model for public API consumption

patterns_discovered.description: Models are imported from their individual modules and re-exported via __all__ list
patterns_discovered.context: Following Python best practices for package initialization, allows clean API surface

patterns_discovered.description: Related models grouped together (Equipment and EquipmentChecklist adjacent)
patterns_discovered.context: EquipmentTemplate inserted near equipment-related imports maintaining logical grouping

patterns_discovered.description: Each model added in two places: import statement and __all__ list
patterns_discovered.context: Ensures both direct importing and star import (* ) work correctly

gotchas_discovered.description: EquipmentTemplate is imported from app.models.equipment_template (separate module from equipment.py)
gotchas_discovered.risk: File structure must match import statement or runtime ImportError will occur

gotchas_discovered.description: EquipmentTemplate appears in both import and __all__ list
gotchas_discovered.risk: Forgetting to add to __all__ would hide the model from star imports despite import statement

approach_outcome.method: Direct modification of __init__.py with proper import and export registration
approach_outcome.efficiency: Single commit, minimal changes, follows established patterns
approach_outcome.notes: Task completed on first attempt with no rework needed

recommendations.suggestion: Consider automated tooling to validate all models in package have corresponding __all__ entries
recommendations.rationale: Prevents future inconsistencies between imports and exports

recommendations.suggestion: Add comment in __init__.py documenting the pattern for future contributors
recommendations.rationale: Makes it clear that both import and __all__ registration are required

recommendations.suggestion: Add import tests to verify all models in __all__ are actually importable
recommendations.rationale: Catches import errors that would only surface at runtime otherwise
